__e: A policeman is looking for a girl.
They said the guy who killed the agent was a white man
He said the price for a policeman is different
I owe it to every cop who's walked a beat... every cop who's made a bust... who's ever laid his life on the line!
Hey, aren't you the cop who shot that guy, two years ago?
Sam, this is the policeman who phoned.
So, you're up here because of that police officer who was shot, right?
Hey, aren't you the cop who shot that guy, two years ago?
Right. I got to see him. It's very, very important.
Sam, the man who was killed tonight was a policeman. It's my job to find out what happened.
Yeah. First a policeman and now they say you killed another man today.
Let me tell you something... a little something about police work and women.
And the policeman on the phone said:
We have a policeman on every door.
Dad just told a policeman about those boys in the hot rod.
On the day in question, how long had your man been with the highway patrol?
[Sighs] Did I tell you I was the first cop in my family?
So the rest can go, right?
You got less time than you think. But you never had time. You didn't have time when that parole officer tried to help you.
A pretty girl always has something she wants to buy and a cop always has something he wants to know.
And the policeman said, "I guess you were never a kid."
